amendment.description: To eliminate a waiver of State immunity.

vote.text: Amendment SA 6569, under the order of 12/22/22, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 40 - 57. Record Vote Number: 415.

action.text: Amendment SA 6569 proposed by Senator Schumer for Senator Braun to Amendment SA 6558. (consideration: CR S10070; text: CR S10062) To eliminate a waiver of State immunity.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 6569 proposed by Senator Schumer for Senator Braun to Amendment SA 6558.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 6569, under the order of 12/22/22, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 40 - 57. Record Vote Number: 415.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 6569, under the order of 12/22/22, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 40 - 57. Record Vote Number: 415.
